remarks: The value ` G ` (see ~ om2uz0i ) at an ordinal natural number is in the upper integers.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
statement:
om2uz.1 $e |- C e. ZZ $.
om2uz.2 $e |- G = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) |` _om ) $.
om2uzuzi $p |- ( A e. _om -> ( G ` A ) e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) $.
$d C x $.
